sentences.english: They argue the institute, which will occupy a former divinity school building, is a totem to the late Friedman who they call a dinosaur of economic thought.
sentences.chinese: 他们声称这个研究所是已故弗里德曼的图腾。

sentences.english: However, being portraits of former Headmasters has gained them a unique quality.
sentences.chinese: 不过，作为已故校长的肖像，他们有一个独有的特点。

sentences.english: All the letters of the late writer are compiled in this collection.
sentences.chinese: 这个集子辑录了这位已故作家的所有来往信件。

sentences.english: Tomb-Sweeping Day comes when people go to the tombs of the deceased to pay their respect.
sentences.chinese: 清明节到了，正是给已故的人扫墓上坟的日子。

sentences.english: The family buried the dead relatives in the churchyard.
sentences.chinese: 家人把已故的亲属葬在教堂墓地。

sentences.english: The family had started from their Sector 68 home after midnight and were going to attend the terahnvi (rituals held 13 days after a death) of a relative.
sentences.chinese: 当天深夜，这家人前往参加一位已故亲戚的追悼仪式。

sentences.english: Poor dear old Bishop Grantly had on this matter been too lenient.
sentences.chinese: 已故的亲爱的老格伦雷主教在这个问题上过分宽厚。

sentences.english: This silver spoon of the dead sister was quite an apple of discord.
sentences.chinese: 已故姐姐留下的这把银匙子倒真成了争吵的原因。

sentences.english: Within days, local officials had designated the dead official a "revolutionary martyr."
sentences.chinese: 几天后，当地官员就授予已故官员“革命烈士”称号。

sentences.english: It is possible that the offsprings of widow to marry again resembled the woman's deceased husband.
sentences.chinese: 寡妇第二次婚姻的后代很可能容易像她已故的丈夫。

sentences.english: Dependents of a deceased subscriber are excluded from their counts.
sentences.chinese: 已故的订户抚养的家庭成员会从统计中排除。

sentences.english: La Toya Jackson believes her late brother Michael was "sent from God".
sentences.chinese: 拉托亚杰克逊认为她已故哥哥迈克尔是“神之所赐”。

sentences.english: A well-known British science writer (and former Economist journalist), Mr Ridley has taken on the mantle of rational optimism from the late Mr Simon.
sentences.chinese: 他从已故的西蒙先生那儿接过理性乐观主义的衣钵。

sentences.english: The deceased died of old age.
What was the monastic name of the late art educator Li Shutong?
sentences.chinese: 已故艺术教育家李叔同出家后的法号是什么？

sentences.english: Mr. Li brags of his late father who established the firm.
sentences.chinese: 李先生夸奖创建这所公司的他已故的父亲。

definition: (of a deceased) during one's life/while living
to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to die/to depart this mortal coil
to die/to depart from the world forever
